meanings.sent1: The imagers in her mind painted a beautiful picture of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The artist was known for being a skilled imager, bringing scenes to life with her paintings.
meanings.sent3: The imagers in his head were so vivid, he often got lost in his daydreams.
meanings.sent4: She was an expert imager, able to conjure up detailed images with just her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller's words were like imagers, creating worlds in the minds of the listeners.
